omn_ui_scene.summary: SceneUI helps build great-looking 3d manipulators and 3d helpers with as little code as possible. It provides shapes and controls for declaring the UI in 3D space.

omni_ui_style.summary: OmniUI style allows users to build customized widgets, make these widgets visually pleasant and functionally indicative with user interactions.

omni_viewport.summary: Viewport Next is a preview of the next generation of Kit's Viewport.  It was designed to be as light as possible, providing a way to isolate features and compose them as needed to create unique experiences.

test_kit_tiled_rendering.script:
import omni.kit.commands
from omni.kit.viewport.utility import get_active_viewport
omni.kit.commands.execute('ChangeSetting', path='/rtx-transient/dlssg/enabled', value=False)
defaultVp = get_active_viewport()
defaultVp.render_product_path = '/Render/MultiProd'

stage_creation_script.script:
from pxr import Usd, UsdUtils
import omni.usd
new_stage = Usd.Stage.CreateInMemory()
cache = UsdUtils.StageCache.Get()
cache.Insert(new_stage)
new_stage_id = cache.GetId(new_stage).ToLongInt()
print(new_stage)
omni.usd.get_context().attach_stage_with_callback(new_stage_id, None)
print(new_stage)
omni.usd.get_context().close_stage()
print(new_stage)
